mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Anypoint Platform excels in API management with extensive connector support, catering to API-led integration strategies. Strong in hybrid cloud enterprise integration.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Combines iPaaS, API Management, and ESB in three-layered API architecture. Anypoint Exchange popular among enterprises. Mulesoft Compose provides low-code Salesforce integrations. Major player in top 5 iPaaS vendors.

2020.note: Anypoint Platform excels in API management with extensive connector support, catering to API-led integration strategies. Strong in hybrid cloud enterprise integration.
